WindowPanel

WindowPanel.Rd

Wraps multiple collapsible sections in a draggable, scrollable panel for displaying interactive content.

Usage

WindowPanel(
  panel_layers,
  title,
  window_position,
  width = "auto",
  height = "auto"
)

Arguments

panel_layers

(HTML widget) A list of HTML elements representing individual panel sections.

title

(string) A title for the window panel, displayed at the top.

window_position

(numeric vector) A numeric vector of length 4 specifying the top, right, bottom, and left positioning of the panel.

width

(string, default = "auto") The width of the window panel. Defaults to "auto".

height

(string, default = "auto") The height of the window panel. Defaults to "auto".

Value

An HTML element containing the draggable, scrollable window panel.
